recommended_degree: Teknik Mesin, Teknik Industri, Pendidikan Teknik Elektro, Teknik Fisika, Teknik Kimia (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Observing production processes and supporting production documentation.
Assisting in monitoring production data and daily output reports.
Supporting improvement activities in production area (5S, Kaizen, etc.).
Helping with preparation of production materials.
Supporting in daily operation reporting.
